Description: Field

Name: csum
Description: Field checksum used for duplicate check: Integer representation of first 8 digits of sha1 hash of the first field

Name: data
Description: Currently unused

Name: did
Description: ID of the deck

Name: dname
Description: Name of the card

Name: due
Description: Due is used differently for different card types: new: note id or random int, due: integer day, relative to the collection's creation time, learning: integer timestamp

Name: ease
Description: Which button you pushed to score your recall: review:  1(wrong), 2(hard), 3(ok), 4(easy), learn/relearn:   1(wrong), 2(ok), 3(easy)

Name: factor
Description: The new ease factor of the card in permille (parts per thousand). If the ease factor is 2500, the card’s interval will be multiplied by 2.5 the next time you press Good.

Name: flags
Description: Currently unused

Name: flds
Description: Fields of the card as a concatenated string with fields separated by the ``\x1f`` character. The field names can be retrieved from the corresponding model.

Name: guid
Description: Globally unique id, almost certainly used for syncing

Name: id
Description: ID of the card, note or review in the card, note or revlog table (this corresponds to a epoch millisecond time stamp from the creating time)

Name: ivl
Description: The new interval that the card was pushed to after the review. Positive values are in days; negative values are in seconds (for learning cards).

Name: lapses
Description: The number of times the card went from a "was answered correctly" to "was answered incorrectly" state

Name: lastIvl
Description: Last interval

Name: left
Description: Of the form ``a*1000+b``, with: ``b`` the number of reps left till graduation and ``a`` the number of reps left today

Name: mid
Description: Model ID

Name: mname
Description: Name of the model

Name: mod
Description: Modification time [epoch seconds]

Name: mod
Description: Modification timestamp, epoch seconds

Name: nid
Description: ID of the note

Name: odid
Description: Original did: only used when the card is currently in filtered deck

Name: odue
Description: Original due: only used when the card is currently in filtered deck

Name: ord
Description: Identifies which of the card templates the card corresponds to. Valid values are from 0 to num templates – 1

Name: queue
Description: 3=sched buried, -2=user buried, -1=suspended, 0=new, 1=learning, 2=due (as for type), 3=in learning, next rev in at least a day after the previous review

Name: reps
Description: Number of reviews

Name: sfld
Description: Content of the sort field.

Name: tags
Description: Tags of the note as space-separated string

Name: time
Description: How many milliseconds your review took, up to 60000 (60s)

Name: type
Description: This is 0 for learning cards, 1 for review cards, 2 for relearn cards, and 3 for cram cards (cards being studied in a filtered deck when they are not due).

Name: usn
Description: This column is used to keep track of the sync state of reviews and provides no useful information for analysis.
